setup_conda_envs.is_package_installed¶

setup_conda_envs.is_package_installed(env_name: str, package_name: str)¶

Check to see if the given package package_name is installed in the conda environment evn_name.

Parameters:

  • env_name (string) – the environment name to check.

  • package_name (string) – the package name to check.
